page.title: 13Home Life 3
page.content: On Sunday we had breakfast and then we went to Motherwell to look at caravanettes. We want to buy one to go on holiday . We spent about an hour there. A Toyota Hiace was my parents' choice. I had a great time jumping in and out of them. We went to Edinburgh next to visit friends but they weren't in. So, we went shopping instead.Mum bought a coat for herself and some groceries too. Toyshops were the next stop, and then a restaurant. Here, we paid Â£4.75 for a meal of hamburgers, chips, salad coffees (my parents had these) and orange juice (my sister and I had this).After going to the toilet, where a man locked the cubicle door from the outside,we returned to the friends' house, who were in this time,and we stayed for a meal.Afterwards we went for a walk in a park.
